parameters.content: # Forward Filtered Gmail Notifications to Telegram Chat

## Description :
### This n8n workflow automatically forwards incoming Gmail emails to a Telegram chat only if the email subject contains specific keywords (like "Urgent" or "Server Down"). The workflow extracts key details such as the sender, subject, and message body, and sends them as a formatted message to a specified Telegram chat. This is useful for real-time notifications, security alerts, or monitoring important emails directly from Telegram — filtering out unnecessary emails.
